name: D & R Tech Mart Pvt. Ltd.
overview:
Established in the year 2010, at Gurgaon (Haryana, India), we, “D & R Tech Mart Pvt. Ltd.”, are involved in manufacturing and supplying a qualitative assortment of Epoxy Floor Coating, Epoxy Coving, PU Flooring etc.

Vendor Base: We are associated with the most renowned and certified vendors of the industry for the procurement of high quality products.

Our Quality Assurance: Quality assertion has always remained as one of the foremost objectives of our organization. We act in compliance with the set universal standards in our all business operations.

Client Satisfaction: Due to the unmatched quality of our offered products, we have carved a niche in the industry. By conducting the intensive market study, we try to find the specific requirements of our customers and satisfy them in the best possible manner.

Why Us: With rich industry knowledge in this domain, we are offering an outstanding range of Groove Filling Products, Grouting, etc.

Our Clients: Our valuable clients are as follows:

Tata Motors Bhushan Steel Dabur Pepsico Suzuki AG Industries AAM SONA
